buddy_profile.name: Barney Swan
buddy_profile.title: CEO - ClimateForce
buddy_profile.introduction: I'm passionate about walking the talk, breaking the silos within sustainability and making pathways relevant for all walks of life (especially heavy industry) to diversify their current standard operating procedures.
buddy_profile.how_to_help: Supporting the conversation with actions and advice for business leaders, employees and investors.
buddy_profile.sustainability_motivation: Through a regenerative portfolio, I'm building resilience in rural locations, providing jobs, research capacity and the protection of globally significant ecosystems. I am currently based in Far North Queensland, Australia, pioneering a venture to restore 527 acres of the world's oldest rainforest, Daintree. My team is leveraging next-generation web3 technologies to optimize traditional land management knowledge by delivering organically managed geo-tagged trees in a point cloud dashboard. Through a biodiversity program, advanced robotics, and cutting-edge R&D, ClimateForce is building a scalable model to diversify land management in the tropics. Encouraging nature-based solutions and building trust in sustainable development for businesses, students, and communities.
buddy_profile.organizational_responsibilities: I am managing the totality of running a reforestation project whilst keeping the team aligned on reducing their impact through food, technology and energy options. We are 100% powered off the sun, reducing plastic waste, and plant-based fueled when on the farm.
buddy_profile.challenges_and_solutions: Managing a remote business without promixity to water, waste, energy and food services is by itself a challenge. Being a vertical supply chain is hard but a needed model.
buddy_profile.proudest_achievement: Growing a business from nothing. With 9 full time employees now and over 300+ volunteers engaged on our farm space.

project_details.technologies: web3 technologies, advanced robotics, point cloud dashboard
